website_summaries.verdict: Use this dispenser's pour spout  to draw shapes, patterns, and letters. And you can mix batter right in the container, thanks to the built-in BlenderBall.
pros: Add ingredients to the dispenser, add the BlenderBall and shake
Dispenser cleans up quickly when you add soap, warm water and shake
All parts are top-rack dishwasher safe
Wide base keeps mixer stable when not in use
Use heat-resistant silicone pour spout and squeezable container to draw shapes and patterns with batter
cons: Pour spout doesn't allow you to easily control how quickly batter comes out

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily and love it!
customer_reviews.text: Use it daily to make my Kodiak pancakes and it works beautifully every time. Sometimes a little less or more liquid is required to get the proper consistency, but that ultimately depends on what ingredients you toss into the bottle (along with the mix). Just note that you must be careful not to over-tighten the tip cover or it may crack as mine did shortly after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar F.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought it would be.
customer_reviews.text: I found this pancake mixer not as good as I thought it would be. The batter does not mix as well as you would think. It takes some really hard shakes to get it to mix up. Also, the opening to pour out the batter is too big and the batter comes out to fast and makes a mess. For me, it would be better if the opening was a little smaller and I could control the release of the batter and if the mixing ball was a little bit bigger. I have returned this product for a refund. I know other people like this product, but it did not work well for the one thing I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: easy to
customer_reviews.text: 1. FAVE Cuts down on the drip mess! 2. Perfect for keto/low carb and gluten-free pancakes and waflles, muffins, etc because almond flour settles... you can re-mix with a quick shake - has not leaked with vigorous shaking. 3. Very easy to clean. I just rinse, use every day. Have not tried putting in the dishwasher (will not... want to make sure it lasts, fittings are tight for leak-free shaking.)
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use! Perfect Pancakes!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re thinking of buying this item, DO IT! I originally purchased it because I was tired of scooping my batter with a measuring cup, dripping along the way, just to have oblong-shapped pancakes. This thing makes the perfect round cakes with no mess! I was sceptical about it holding as much batter as we usually use; enough for four people. But it was perfect when we doubled the original recipe! It has a built-in stand when you add your ingredients through the bottom and clean up is a breeze. Don’t think twice; just buy it. You won’t regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: NON RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: Sounded like a great idea, but plastic bottle was cracked - must have been frozen and of course I didn't notice until the batter started leaking all over the stove. I assume the bottle broke during the delivery as I live in Northwest Indiana and we were having below 0 temps at the time, but to find out I can not even return it - is not right.
customer_reviews.author: Killingsworth

customer_reviews.title: Amazing 4 cup waffle/pancake Mixer! Mess Free!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is amazing!!! Been using protein shake bottle for years!!! But the bottom feature is perfect and it comes with measurements!!!! The bottle is a great size too, allows for up to 4 cups. Much Larger than I imagined it to be. Great for older kids to use to make waffles. Mess free!! Less dishes for me to wash!!
customer_reviews.author: JaeDior

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product. It leaks so when shaking it the liquid went everywhere. The whisk ball just got caked with flour and didn't actually "whisk" anything. Instead of saving on a bowl or two I had to dump it into a bowl and do by hand.
customer_reviews.author: HLS

customer_reviews.title: Bowl still works better.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this product. Very difficult to get pancake mix into the container without getting it everywhere. Not all the clumps always break up when you shake it and then gets clogged in the tip. The ridges are very difficult to clean out and ended up causing mold to form and I was unable to get it cleaned out. Ended up throwing it away after only 2 uses. Bowl still works better.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Mitchel

customer_reviews.title: Weird but brilliant use for this kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: My 3 dogs get Dinovite each night with yogurt. I was really looking for an easy to load squeeze bottle that would allow me to keep a 10-14 days of premixed supplement Stash ready for their meals. This works Brilliantly. I took out the mixer ball and loaded the yogurt and Dimovite mixture with a bit of water to make it like thick pancake batter. The rmixture loaded easily from the bottom opening. Best of all the bottle structure was such I could squirt a good dollop in each bowl without any messy spoons. Eureka! Now I need to order one for its original intended use, pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie In Bonifay

customer_reviews.title: pancake batter mixer
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking that It was right size for one person to use. Wrong me. It was bigger in size than I thought. I only use one cup of pancake mix at one time for single person and I have hard time trying to mix the water and pancake mix together by shaking the mixer and no matter how hard i try to shake to mix the batter I cannot get it to mix together and I end up having to use bowl and mix to make pancakes for myself. maybe it would work better if I was making pancakes for more than one person.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Faucher

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: If I was going to design something for easily making pancakes, I would make this. It makes it super easy to mix and pour batter. I used it for camp cooking on a griddle. It has a lot of little design perks that you wouldn't even think to add unless you've run into that problem. Like the screw in stopper, or the way base acts as a cradle to hold it upright hands free while you pour in the water and batter mix. I've tried other pancake batter dispensers and those don't hold a candle to this (like the ones with the squeeze handle and the bottom porthole the batter squirts out of). Great design, does its job well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: My family loves when I make pancakes but it is such a mess to clean up. I was really excited to see this product. Unfortunately, it doesn't live up to MY expectations. I thought the shaker ball was a great idea but it still left clumps in the batter. the tip leaks even with the cap on and you have to have it upside down in order to add the pancake flour and water. Good idea but not designed well. Very easy to clean up though.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for quality

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this thinking it would make less mess and easy to clean up. But neither of those things are true. First, when adding the powder mix you have to do it in small portions or it wont mix completely. Second, when adding small portions of the powder mix you have to open ot after it has been shook, so there is air pressure built up, and often gets the batter all over the rim, making a mess. Third, there is not a very good seal either side so batter leaks out while shaking. And forth, there are several parts making washing a hassle. Not what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Sky

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work As Expected
customer_reviews.text: You need to mix the batter in a bowl first if you want this to work. The wire ball did not do the job. In my opinion, not worth the extra step and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Howard

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice thing to have...
customer_reviews.text: I make crepes and this stores enough batter for about 8 to 10 crepes, enough to keep me supplied for 3 days or so. This stores the batter so you can make it a day ahead to let it set, and then make crepes at your leisure. Any batter could be stored in this for that matter, it has a wire ball inside to mix it up after you have made the batter, I would not try to actually mix dry ingredients and wet inside this. use it more as a dispenser/storage container. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Alden Morse

customer_reviews.title: Making pancakes is so easy now.
customer_reviews.text: My headline says it all. Super easy to use. The best way that I found to use this is to add the dry ingredients first, the wet ones (eggs, oil and milk) next and the mixing ball last. It's super easy to clean too. Just fill it with a little water, put the mixing ball in and shake. Do this a couple of times before cleaning it with soap and water and it will take little effort to remove the remaining batter from it. I wish I would have purchased one of these many years ago. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I recommend getting one.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually pretty slick and well thought out. You fill this from the bottom, it unscrews and the bottom base has an opening for the top to fit in while you fill it up (I recommend holding it, but it actually works quite well). Add liquid first, then powder, close, and shake. I was surprised at how well it works. The silicone heat resistant tip makes using it on my Blackstone a breeze, and it's all easy to clean. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lead Therapy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to dispense
customer_reviews.text: This saves on dishes by far! It opens at both ends which makes for easy cleaning. The bottle is a bit thin but it allows you to easily squeeze the batter out. I initially thought the batter would fall out when tipped over but I’m able to squeeze out the size pancakes I want and then return to upright position. I haven’t put it in the dishwasher yet even tho it says top rack safe. It was just quicker to understand wash cause we use it daily now.
customer_reviews.author: Smoore

customer_reviews.title: I thought I would like it...
customer_reviews.text: I thought this is what I needed to aid in making pancakes and waffles quicker in the morning, less dirty dishes. But, I think this is not what I needed. First off, it will not hold my recipe for waffles, there is dry batter that doesn't get mixed, so I had to hand mix inside the container. It is useful for pouring out the batter for waffles or pancakes but it's awkwardly big and my hand hurts while using it. Need something with a stirring action...will keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ck1975

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: A great idea but very poorly designed. It doesn’t mix well and the top fell off causing batter to spill everywhere. Switched to a bowl and threw this out. Save your money and skip this product!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breezy Batter
customer_reviews.text: We make pancakes and waffles almost daily. This little gadget is so great. No need to dirty up bowls and utensils anymore. You throw your ingredients in the container, the wire whisk ball blends it well, you squeeze it on your pan or griddle and Wha Lah! Your done! Easy Breezy! Oh and then clean up... simple. Take off one of the ends and add water, shake it, dump it and screw off the ends and put it in the dishwasher. Such an easy concept. Oh and if you have extra batter you can store it in the same container and put it in the refrigerator. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget for mess-free pancake breakfasts
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived nice, clean, proper condition. I tried it the next day to make pancakes. It actually holds more, than I anticipated. You have to shake it well to have the batter properly mixed, then you are ready to go. We like it so far. You probably can put blueberries, chocolate chip etc in, but I always add them to the pancake in the pan, so do not care about them fitting through the spout of the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: AnneM

customer_reviews.title: making pancake with this is actually fun
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 9 years old and she's at the age that she wants to help with anything. This pancake mixer is perfect for that purpose. I put all the ingredients in and I let her shake. As the mixture gets thicker, it becomes harder to shake, so her whole body moves as she tries to mix it really well. Using it is easy, you squeeze the amount of pancake mix you want over the pan, stop squeezing, and it won't drip so it doesn't make a mess. If i can finish the whole batch on the same day, I put it in the fridge, and make pancake again the next day.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I got this because my kids love to make their own pancakes and my 5, 7 and 9 year old are not good at not making a huge mess in the process. They usually make pretty lumpy pancakes that are difficult to smooth out by themselves. They really didn't want parent help to make them all the time so we got this to try. we were hoping for less mess and to hopefully have to eat less lumpy bumpy pancakes. It does work pretty good but it can be difficult to add the dry ingredients so it didn't help with less mess but does help with less bumps.
customer_reviews.author: David Young

customer_reviews.title: it is so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Breakfast with pancakes is not rocket science but it can get messy and complicated with the various utensils required. This is one stop shop. pour in the ingredients. close cover and shake. watch the whisk ball do all the magic (be sure to close covers tightly) after mixing, open up cap and pour out the mixture onto the pan/griddle. washing is a breeze, put in water, shake and rinse. I've delegated the pancake mixing task to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Justchillin

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: If you like pancake mix leaking all over then this is for you. Not worth bothering to send back, threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: D.A.K

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast is a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Love this for making waffles and pancakes! Gets the batter nice and smooth with not an excessive amount of shaking. It also holds a large amount of batter. Caution! Don’t forget to put the cap back on when you shake it. My husband made that entertaining mistake. I mix up batter and leave it in the fridge for days with this container. It is super convenient. It can be difficult to clean some of the grooves where the top screws in. Overall, really great and keeps you pan/stovetop clean. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse practitioner by day - mommy by night

customer_reviews.title: Not Returnable
customer_reviews.text: Nothing revolutionary here, not any better than making it the regular way. my product arrived without mixing ball....be aware this not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: nalukane

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it works okay
customer_reviews.text: It worked. Not that bad to clean but I had to use a special brush to get into all the crevices. There are 4 pieces to the design, which is nice to get the batter into the bottom of the bottle. I can store the batter in the fridge for several hours with the air tight lid, which is also nice. I'll go back to a bowl as this was not a tool that gave me a huge improvement
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Its It's really handy and works well
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the mixed reviews i really wasn't sure if i should buy this or not but im glad i took the plunge. It's awesome! So simple and yet ssoo useful. No crazy cardio required like others posted, just a reasonable shake. And it saves me from using a lot of extra dishes and making a mess pouring out the batter. For a family with young kids whom love their homemade pancakes on the weekend, this just makes sense!
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this contraption! I know it's dishwasher safe, but my dishwasher broke so I had to hand wash it. I was concerned about the whisk ball, but A-HA! Easy to wash because it's a round spring! Perfect in all ways.. Easy to use, easy to wash, everything disassembled and perfect. Saves on washing bowls, measuring cups, spoons, etc. I am impressed to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: IneedMorePockets

customer_reviews.title: Leaks milk, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Because it leaks milk and other liquids, it is not helpful. Drink cups that mix protein drinks do no leak -- that was one problem I did not expect. Not useful.
customer_reviews.author: Judie E

customer_reviews.title: Good Product intelligently designed
customer_reviews.text: The pancake batter mix storage and dispenser is a well designed product performing 'the one job it has' up to expectation. The product is durable and comes well packaged along with description of the food-product safe materials used to manufacture it. The base opens up which makes cleaning the bottle easy and hygienic. With a reasonable price point and acceptable delivery window, I would be happy to recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PC360

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE, PERFECT PANCAKES
customer_reviews.text: used this morning for the first time and was very excited to have perfect pancakes. di need to make sure consistancy is quite accurate. Would not reccomend using the measurements on the bottle as they are slightly off...stick with measuring cups....VERY SATISFIED and excited none the less.
customer_reviews.author: shopoholic

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I made a small batch of pancakes. I followed the instructions for using the bottom as a stand to fill the container. The liquids leaked into the bottom and I was unable to salvage them so I had to clean and start fresh with a second batch. Second batch I filled from the top, but it was very difficult to get the ingredients in without making a mess. The whisk trapped the ingredients and made it difficult to pour. Lots of wasted batter on the inside of the container. Will likely trash since I cannot return.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for making up some waffle/pancake batter, particularly if you have a small household and don't use all of it at once. Pop the leftover into the fridge and later you can add a little liquid and make another batch. Doesn't get a bowl, fork, whisk all dirty. Cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Love this, it’s a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple of months ago and just started to use it, LOVE this! It’s such a brilliant idea. I used it to make waffles this morning and it was so easy; open the larger mouth, flip over and use the base as a stand, fill water to the measured line, threw other ingredients, closed the base, shook a few times and done. It squirted perfectly into the waffle maker and it was super easy to clean (warm water with soap and shake). I absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc Phong

customer_reviews.title: It's great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for all of my kids and decided I needed one as well. A great product. Dont put the cap in the dishwasher. I put mine in the silverware container and the water pressure pushed it right out and it landed in the bottom of the dishwasher where the element melted it on the very first wash. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Sherie W

customer_reviews.title: Last Bit of Batter won’t Come Out of the Bottle
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good idea & it works pretty well for the 1st few pancakes, but the last few refuse to come out of the bottle & I spent a good 10 minutes trying to scrape the last 2 pancakes worth of batter out of it & couldn’t get the batter out of the mixing ball at all. I would give it 👎👎 overall.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: weekend pancake warriors:
customer_reviews.text: can we mix and pour pancake batter in traditional ways?... of course we can! but this little gem creates weekend wizards at the griddle! i gifted this to my s.i.l. to mix/squeeze gf pancake batter. the small, animal face pancakes he makes have never been more uniform in size, shape and doneness. my granddaughter digs em! and i dig that the batter shaker is easy for him to mix, make and clean - no more weekend breakfast kitchen nightmare :)
customer_reviews.author: a carey

customer_reviews.title: Is cool but not amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a middle of the road product. It’s easy to fill the first batch but any second batches are messy as hell. Cleaning sounds easy but a bowl and a whisk actually takes less time due to no nooks and crannies unlikes this thing. I would not buy again but that does not mean it’s not better for someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it—it’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am FURIOUS at myself for not purchasing this two years ago when I added it to my list. It is SO easy to use and it makes perfect uniform sizing a breeze. It honestly took my pancake game to another level. As far as clean up, the instructions explain that you just need to add water, soap, and shake, and I laughed. “Ha, sure,” I scoffed, adding water and soap and shaking. “This will surely get all the pancake batter wedged into the crevices of the top and bottom out.” Then I took the bottom off to rinse and... it was clean??? Truly magical. Seriously, just buy it. It’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: prittyspeshul

customer_reviews.title: Great from making pancakes without a big mess
customer_reviews.text: Great for making pancakes. No muss no fuss. Perfectly round pancakes, you could also make bears or other shapes because you control with th rate for making pancakes. No muss no fuss. Perfectly round pancakes, you could also make banners or other shapes because you control with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B.

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: My kids love pancakes so I was excited to use this but it was a disaster. The mix got all clumped in the whisk ball and there was no way to shake the ingredients together. Then it was a beast to clean. I wasted 20 minutes and finally tossed it in the sink and made a new batch the normal way.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey H

customer_reviews.title: Better option that a mixing bowl!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a lot bigger than I expected but I love it! It’s easy to use, you simply pour all ingredients into bottle because the mouth is pretty wide, mix and pour into waffle maker or griddle to make a pancake! It’s a better option than using a huge mix bowl for your baking needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Agapito

customer_reviews.title: Messy and poor design.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough oomph to mix the batter. Just clumps. The top doesn't have the little plastic flap, so the batter streams out as soon as it is inverted. Big mess. Big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: K. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Does not mix thicker pancake batter well. It does a great job with thin crepe batter. Also leaks from the bottom no matter what I’ve tried to get it to seal. It’s awkward to uses because the pouring end doesn’t stand up, so you’re constantly flipping it back and forth, which makes it hard to drain and use the last of the batter; it ends up wasting a lot. I would return this if I hadn’t already used it and tossed the original box.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical about how well this would work but i was pleasantly suprised at how easy this is. No mixing bowels so clean up is easy. The batter was well mixed and the spout is big enough to add fruits or chocolate chips without getting stuck. I also love that of i dont finish the batter i can stick the whole thing in the fridge for later. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Maureena Cole

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Cool item. Bigger than I thought - I expected it to be about the size of a restaurant mustard squeeze bottle, but this is taller and wider at the bottom. We use it for pancake mix or scrambled eggs while camping. The bottle opens from the top OR the bottom by unscrewing the white caps, which I didn't realize until I received it. Overall, a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: thatoneguy

customer_reviews.title: No mess!!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I rated less stars on easy to use is because pancake mix does get a little bit caught while trying to mix together. However I found that if I make the pancake batter or cupcake batter for that matter then put it in, I am still able to not make a mess distributing my batter which was my main goal.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: not all that useful
customer_reviews.text: The mixing ball is useless; i had to use my stick mixer to get a decent battery and cupcake mix stuck to the mixing ball wasting batter. Better off using a bowl and pouring the batter into the wiskware dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: lane l owyang

customer_reviews.title: Use it for what its made for!
customer_reviews.text: It's called a "Pancake Batter Mixer" and if that's what you use it for then it works great! It's NOT for anything but Pancake Batter! No clutter with big bowls, it's virtually drip free and distributes pancake batter smoothly and evenly! The quality of the bottle is very good! Not cheap thin plastic. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Wayne Turner

customer_reviews.title: Make Pancakes with ease
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to make pancakes. Put all the ingredients in then pull a Taylor Swift and shake it off. The only issue I had is some of the pancake batter will remain unmixed around the edges, so you either have to use another tool, or go with a less than ideal mixture.
customer_reviews.author: R Mac

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Saturday, threw it away Sunday!
customer_reviews.text: I don't even want a refund I was so disappointed in the product that I threw it away. Mixed contents as needed and inserted metal mixing ball. My son shook the heck out of this and I took over and was confident there was no batter left unmixed. Nope, one pancake was formed on griddle then the next two came out as half mixed batter half batter powder. This is a novelty at best. One good thing though, cleaning was easy......SWISH! into the trashcan!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: I shoulda kept my money.
customer_reviews.text: The dried pancake mix stays in the bottom of the mixer, no matter how frantically I shake it. I have to open it and scrape with a spoon to get all the mix. It’s really nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy crepes, can store leftovers in fridge
customer_reviews.text: if you use too much mix you can’t shake it, so i pretty much can only make crepes with it personally because i don’t have the patience but it’s still a great buy, store the rest in fridge for next day.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pancake batter mixer after I saw someone else using! Oh man, it’s a game changer! It’s so easy to use and clean. Plan on putting it in our camper for quick and easy pancakes!
customer_reviews.author: Zoey Karimzada

customer_reviews.title: Great mixer!
customer_reviews.text: No more dirty bowls when whipping up our Saturday morning pancakes. Great to have the measures on the side, the little cap to shake it up. Rinse it out and throw it in the dishwasher. I wish the tip was a little smaller to make more intricate designs, definitely not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt and Kati

customer_reviews.title: Must have for making waffles or pancakes for a full family
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put your ingredients in since it flips over on itself. No trying to hold it and dump in flour or mix. Mixes well since there’s a mixing ball, fits well in fridge. Cleans up easily
customer_reviews.author: jmerook

customer_reviews.title: Makes pancakes easy.
customer_reviews.text: This product has made pancake making a breeze. I now make my mix the night before and wake up and get to cooking with no mess. It doesn't work well with thick batter, however stirring the mix in the bottle isn't a difficult process. Honestly just to be able dispense the batter and make 6 pancakes in the span of 30 secs instead of pouring, wiping, pouring, wiping, so on.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hodgson

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Turn it up, set it in the base, add the ingredients, put the top on tightly with lid in place and shake. It mixes everything with no problems. The right amount of batter easily pours for each pancake.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mixer. I bought it to take camping instead of buying the shakers with the powder inside from the store. They are very over priced. This worked like a charm and we had the kids making the pancakes in no time. I will be using it for home use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chel2435

customer_reviews.title: Use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this for long time. Bought. Found hard to handle with my old age hands. If a little narrower I could squeeze it easier and putting choc chips in batter did not work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Only good for more batter
customer_reviews.text: I like the idea but unfortunately it doesn't really work unless there's a certain amount of batter in there. I only make pancakes for two so it wasn't enough to mix it well, nor did it squeeze out well. I ended up pouring it out into a bowl to mix it.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: More trouble than it is worth....
customer_reviews.text: So many things wrong, batter must be mixed before Using dispenser and still it keeps getting clogged, you can’t get batter out unless very liquid consistency, hard to clean...more trouble than it is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Madalena Mansinho

customer_reviews.title: Fun In The Kitchen Tool
customer_reviews.text: This makes mixing pancake or waffle batter fun and easy. It keeps the kids busy shaking this blender and is durable enough to take their beatings too without leakage. It is great for controlling the size of your pancakes and makes breakfast fun.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Works well for purpose
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what you want it to do. Mixes well and pours well. My only complaint is that it’s pretty big and a bit cumbersome to put in dishwasher and store.
customer_reviews.author: Reviews Help

customer_reviews.title: Great to store waffle/pancake batter
customer_reviews.text: We constantly keep this in the fridge with fresh batter for daily morning waffles. I love having the mixing ball inside because I can give it a little shake before using. I do mix the batter in a bowl before pouring it in. I tried using the blender for mixing in the bottle but it does not do it as good. However still love it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing... will get more
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I don't use it for pancake batter.... I'm a fluid paint artist and this container is great for storing my paint mixes. It's a good quality item and can be used for lots of things I imagine. Works great for my purposes :)
customer_reviews.author: Terry Greene

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I love making pancakes for my family but hated for the pancake mix to spill all over. This is super handy and love that when you pour , you can control how much batter comes out.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: I wish the wide mouth was easier to use when filling you cannot set it down due to the nozzle on the top. Worked great definitely recommend this product I will be ordering a second to keep in my camper!
customer_reviews.author: Kingston

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Makes pancakes from mix with no mess. I used to mix in a bowl and scoop with a measuring cup. This is a million times easier to mix and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great for bubble waffles!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my son fell in love with bubble waffles as I needed something that would fill the bubbles. This product has proven to fit my needs perfectly. I don't really use the mixer ball, although I do shake up the batter once it has been mixed and stored overnight. Highly recommend this for pancake or waffle lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! My kids want pancakes all the time. And I just fill this up and it's super easy! You can take apart to clean all pieces easily. It's a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: The basics of what you need to know.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this product works as intended. My two only issue is that there is no gasket in the bottom lid or the bigger of the lids. When I started to shake the mixer pancake mix was leaking from the lid. To make this a solid mixer please add a gasket to prevent leakage. Nobody wants to be cleaning pancake mix from the walls of their house. Lastly the measurements are slight off. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Convinient, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: So much faster and easier than using a bunch of bowls and whisks. And you can just put it in the fridge for the next day and doesn't take up nearly as much room as Tupperware (another dish to clean). Comes apart so you can clean every area no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was about to give a bad review. Then I noticed I had the wrong lid on it. Once I found that hiding in our drawer of unclaimed lids, everything was great. Tip: do smaller batches. A lot easier to mix thoroughly and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: thedannyd

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to make pancakes for our granddaughter, the mixing of pancake mix was quite easy. However when you try to squirt the batter the wire ball clogs up the nozzle at the top. It cleaned up extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: Robbin Outlaw

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hype
customer_reviews.text: It’s easier to mix the batter, but the first time I used it I kept the lid closed and it got filled with hair and felt like the bottle would burst. The pancakes weren’t fluffy at all and the opening of the bottle is pretty big so you end up pouring a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nipuna P.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy in our RV!
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to mix up pancake batter and that would store extra batter but didn't take up much room. This is perfect! And it's so easy to clean :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Alford

customer_reviews.title: Dirty, filthy
customer_reviews.text: I received the item very dirty like it has been used, ne nozzle all black , the only reason I didn't return it ,it cost me more to
customer_reviews.author: shawna

customer_reviews.title: Decent pancake making tool.
customer_reviews.text: Overall pretty good tool. The batter doesn’t come all the way out sometimes and even with a dishwasher sometimes the batter doesn’t come out all the way when you clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Chandler Benfer

customer_reviews.title: An Amazon MUST have!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this and wish I had it years ago! Many many Saturday and Sunday mornings could’ve been cleaner and more fun if I’d just had this around. It makes pancakes and waffles a breeze to make now with virtually one item to clean!!! It’s awesome! My kids could’ve helped with breakfast, trusting they wouldn’t spill the mix all over the place!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jackie Reid

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect fluffy Pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who loves to make our family breakfast. This has been a game changer! This bottle makes for more bubbles and gives us fluffier Pancakes! So good!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Zeleney

customer_reviews.title: Much more efficient vs spooning batter or pouring from a bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how quick and efficient this tool is. Makes the process of transferring pancake batter to the griddle much, much neater process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great impulse buy
customer_reviews.text: This was an impulse buy that I'm glad I bought. Easy to mix and so easy to clean. The one thing I did learn is not to use to hot of water or it will bubble out everywhere making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: FBmom75

customer_reviews.title: This is a great thing!
customer_reviews.text: Works great it’s a good idea I make the whole mix right in the bottle. Less mess and quick cleanup and or storage.
customer_reviews.author: Elli

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its great... I can put it in fridge with left over mix and it doesnt leak.. easy to wash if you do it right away..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You need this
customer_reviews.text: If you eat pancakes, you need this in your life. Ever pancake was perfect 👌🏾 no drips and clean-up in a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s really easy to make pancakes with this!!! It’s great! Just pour water and pancake mix into container and shake. No mess to clean up. Refrigerate container with any extra mix to make for the next morning. No complaints, I’d buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for making waffles!
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome & easy to use. Less mess & so convient to use. Good quality plastic. Comes apart easily to give it a good cleaning. I love how easy it is to fill my waffle maker with this. Im so precise now. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: McSusie

customer_reviews.title: Defect product
customer_reviews.text: The rubber on the top nossle came with a tear in it. It looks like somethings wrong from the top view as well. Pretty frustrating. I immediately went to return or replace which told me there are no returns on this product. I’m very disappointed that i was sent a “new” product that is defected.
customer_reviews.author: Alexi baldwin

customer_reviews.title: The last thing you need to clutter up your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Takes up much storeage room. My kids weren’t interested. They are just as happy to stir the batter.
customer_reviews.author: Arthurdog

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I don’t like having single use tools in the kitchen because of space saving and all that but this is amazing. It’s so efficient and clean and easy to use and wash afterwards. Gives you the perfect shape size pancake every time. I highly highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mom who loves making pancakes. She hasn't used it yet but the white pressure cap is missing so i need to get the cover for that.
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Benoit

customer_reviews.title: Great idea.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great concept, but it only works for a thin batter. I recommend thin batters only.
customer_reviews.author: J. Love

customer_reviews.title: Pancake lover
customer_reviews.text: Must have in the kitchen if you love Pancakes easy to use easy to clean store in refrigerator ready to use in the morning
customer_reviews.author: JOSE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Buy
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. Came in an bubbled envelope wasn’t fully protected but every thing was intact and noooo damage to any of the parts or bottle. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: OhMyStarz_83

customer_reviews.title: Works great for cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: I make a lot of cupcakes. Getting the batter into the cups took a long time with a ladle and it was drippy. This batter bottle held the whole bowl of batter and I could use a spatula to scrape down the sides at the end. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Be careful when shaking
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this but it completely disappointed me. I put the ingredients in, tightened the lid and shook it to mix the batter. Milk flew everywhere! I checked the lid and it was on tight but it didn’t contain the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marrow

product_meta.title: Whiskware Pancake Batter Mixer with BlenderBall Wire Whisk
product_meta.description:
Whip up smooth batters with minimal cleanup thanks to the Whiskware Batter Mixer. The Whiskware batter mixer uses a patented mixing system to deliver smooth batters in seconds. Simply add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. No separate mixing bowl, no messy spoons, and no batter-coated countertops. The surgical-grade, stainless steel ball whips around inside the bottle as you shake to quickly blend the ingredients. No batteries, no cord, no hassle. When you're finished cooking, the batter mixer cleans up in less than 30 seconds. Simply add soap and warm water, shake, and rinse. All parts are also top-rack dishwasher safe. The Whiskware batter mixer's silicone tip provides perfect control, and won't melt if touched to the pan or griddle. The batter mixer features a wide opening for adding ingredients, and the base doubles as a stand to keep it stable. Many batters expand when mixed, creating pressure inside the bottle. The Whiskware batter mixer features a unique pressure-release cap designed to let air escape as its removed, without spraying batter. The Whiskware batter mixer makes it easy to draw shapes, patterns, and much more thanks to the easy-pour spout. Draw straight from your imagination or use the free Whiskware Recipe app to get step-by-step instructions for fun, creative designs (available for iOS and Android)

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 




BlenderBall Mixes as You Shake The Whiskware Batter Mixer uses a patented mixing system to deliver smooth batters in seconds. Add your ingredients, drop in the BlenderBall, and shake. The surgical-grade, stainless steel ball whips around inside the bottle as you shake to blend the ingredients. No batteries, no cord, no hassle.

Crazy-Easy Cleanup When you're finished cooking, the batter mixer cleans up in less than 30 seconds. Simply add soap and warm water, shake, and rinse. All parts are top-rack dishwasher safe. 




Heat-Resistant Silicone Tip The Whiskware Batter Mixer's silicone tip provides perfect control, and won't melt if touched to the pan or griddle.

Base Doubles as a Stand The Batter Mixer features a wide opening for adding ingredients, and the base doubles as a stand to keep it stable.

Pressure-Release Cap Many batters expand when mixed, creating pressure inside the bottle. The Whiskware Batter Mixer features a unique pressure-release cap designed to let air escape as its removed, without spraying batter.




Have a Little Fun The Whiskware batter mixer makes it easy to draw shapes, patterns, and more thanks to the easy-pour spout. Draw from your imagination or use the free Whiskware recipe app for step-by-step instructions




About the Startup Describe your product in 3 words.

Fast, Fun, and Easy

How did you come up with the idea for this product?

We saw an opportunity to make cooking breakfast faster, easier, more enjoyable and without the huge mess of traditional methods for making pancakes, waffles, etc.

What makes your product special?

The Batter Mixer lets you mix, pour, and store batter—all with the same container. It's patented mixing system uses the BlenderBall wire whisk to easily blend the ingredients while you shake.

What has been the best part of your startup experience?

Whiskware by BlenderBottle is about challenging conventional methods of cooking to find a better way. We’ve tested hundreds of products, methods, and dishes, and are excited to share our innovations
feature_bullets: The fastest, easiest way to make smooth batters for pancakes, waffles, crepes, and more. Simply add ingredients, toss in the BlenderBall, and shake
The batter mixer cleans up in less than 30 seconds. Simply add soap and warm water, shake, and rinse. All parts are top-rack dishwasher safe
A wide opening makes it easy to add ingredients, and the base doubles as a stand to keep the mixer stable while cooking
Draw shapes, patterns, and much more thanks to the easy-pour spout. Use the free Whiskware Recipe app to get instructions for fun, creative designs
A heat-resistant silicone spout won't melt if touched to the griddle and the pressure-release cap will keep batter from spraying. 4.5 cup capacity
